short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your tabs effectively with advanced features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Advanced Tab Manager is the ultimate tool for managing your browser tabs with ease and efficiency. With features like pinning/unpinning tabs, muting/unmuting tabs, reloading tabs, closing tabs, and moving tabs to new windows, you can streamline your browsing experience. Save and restore your browsing sessions effortlessly, schedule sessions for later use, and organize your tabs by setting timers and grouping them. Bookmark all your tabs with a single click and enter Focus Mode to minimize distractions. Ideal for users who need to manage multiple tabs and sessions, Advanced Tab Manager enhances productivity and ensures a smoother workflow. Install it now to take control of your tabs and boost your browsing efficiency.
